abilities.name: The Scent of Blood
abilities.rule: Each time this model declares a charge that targets one or more units below Starting Strength, add 1 to the Charge roll. If one or more of the targets of that charge are Below Half-strength, add 2 to the Charge roll instead.

abilities.name: Savage Exaltation
abilities.rule: Each time this model makes a melee attack that targets an enemy unit that is below its Starting Strength, add 1 to the Hit roll and, if that attack targets an enemy unit that is Below Half-strength, add 1 to the Wound roll as well.

wargear_options: ■ This model’s lasher tendrils can be replaced with 2 magma cutters.
unit_composition:
